mapper.insert: insert into dm_phone_price (id, brand, title, create_date, website, price) values (#{id}, #{brand}, #{title}, #{createDate}, #{website}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT t2.id, t2.brand, t2.title, t2.create_date, t2.website, t2.price FROM ( SELECT id FROM dm_phone_price ORDER BY id LIMIT #{startIndex},#{pageSize})t1,dm_phone_price t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.id
